Name: Wish of the Far Sea
Description:
"Its edge points straight into the distance, like tides rushing toward the endless sky.
It holds the sea's whispers, engraving vows between wind and water.
Every thrust is for the sake of protection, turning gales into unwavering creed.
And the knight's wish shall echo with the tide, reaching the farthest shore."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths VIII")
Description2: When equipped, the weapon's appearance will be replaced with: Wish of the Far Sea.
